ygData.subject: RE: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: So then how can you say that Reinforced is useless ? If nobody has it, that is.
ygData.messageBody:
So then how can you say that Reinforced is "useless" ? If nobody has it,
that is.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lemac Justerian [SMTP:lemac@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 12:09 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banded Prices
>
> From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
> > From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> >
> > I wasn't aware that Reinforced Leather was useless. Tell a Druid that.
>
> How many druids do you see wearing it? Probably only the ones that smith
> it
> themselves! I have run across MANY druids of many levels and have never
> seen even ONE that was wearing Reinforced Leather... But hey, maybe that
> is
> just me on my server...
>
> Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
> Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com
>
